text: Ditazole is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory agent with analgesic and antipyretic activity similar to phenylbutazone.https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/compound/Ditazole It is also a platelet aggregation inhibitor which is marketed in Spain and Portugal under the trade name Ageroplas.Martindale's Complete Drug ReferenceThe Merck Index, 12th Edition. 3432 == References == Category:Oxazoles Category:Antiplatelet drugs Category:Ethanolamines
title: Ditazole
